thread.title: Actor Randy Quaid, wife released from Vermont jail
thread.title_full: Actor Randy Quaid, wife released from Vermont jail

title: Actor Randy Quaid, wife released from Vermont jail
text:
> Entertainment Actor Randy Quaid, wife released from Vermont jail Evi Quaid, left, hugs attorney Peter Langrock and she and her husband, actor Randy Quaid, have their handcuffs removed in court Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in St. Albans, Vt. A Vermont judge released the couple, who says they'll now address 5-year-old criminal charges in California. (Elodie Reed/St. Albans Messenger via AP, Pool)
